sentences.en: A vulgar flaring paper adorned the walls.
sentences.cn: 墙壁上装饰着廉价的花纸.
所有那些削尖脑袋向上爬的可耻行径！

sentences.en: He depicts the sordid and vulgar sides of life exclusively.
sentences.cn: 他只描写人生肮脏和庸俗的一面.

sentences.en: He is too lofty to stoop to vulgar intrigue.
sentences.cn: 他的清高使他还不至于屈就卑俗的勾当.

sentences.en: His language is a bit vulgar at times.

sentences.cn: 他粗俗的举止使大家大为吃惊.

sentences.en: I hate you to use such vulgar words.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌你用这种下流的字眼.

sentences.en: I think it's a very vulgar house.
sentences.cn: 我觉得这所房子很俗气。

sentences.en: I think that is the most vulgar and tasteless remark I ever heard in my life.
sentences.cn: 我觉得那是我平生听过的最粗俗不堪的话了。

sentences.en: She found their laughter and noisy games coarse and rather vulgar.
sentences.cn: 她觉得他们的笑声和吵吵闹闹的游戏趣味低下，俗不可耐。

sentences.en: The film is tasteless, vulgar and even badly shot.
sentences.cn: 这部电影毫无品位、庸俗不堪，甚至可以说拍得很烂。

sentences.en: The house was full of costly, but very vulgar furniture.
sentences.cn: 房子里摆满了最贵但俗不可耐的家俱.

sentences.en: They seemed to her rather vulgar and ill-bred.
sentences.cn: 在她看来他们非常粗俗无礼。

words.tran_cn: 粗俗；粗俗语；粗野的动作

trans.tran_cn: 庸俗的，俚俗的，粗俗的，一般大众的，老百姓的，粗野的，下流的
trans.tran_en: not having or showing good taste; not polite, elegant or well behaved
